span.strong: 2020-21 Pre-Enrollment for NEW students is available NOW!
1st Day of the 2020-21 School Year is Wednesday, August 12, 2020!
Enroll Your Student Online! All Grades - TK or K through 8th!

div.div: Please use the link above to enroll NEW students for the current 2019-20 school year, or to pre-enroll NEW students for the 2020-21 School Year.
Existing students do not need to re-enroll for the next school year.

div.h3: Find Us on FacebookTop of Page
2020 California Healthy Kids Consent Forms & Surveys (CHKS) for 5th & 7th GradesTop of Page

div.strong: It's California Healthy Kids Survey Time!

div.div:
The California Healthy Kids Survey (CHKS) is a comprehensive student data collection system that addresses school climate, health risks and behaviors, and youth resiliency. It's an anonymous, confidential survey of school climate and safety, student wellness, and youth resiliency.
If you have a 5th-grade student, please return the permission form by Monday, March 9. Need a new permission form? You can get one BELOW. If you would like to review the survey, there are hard copies in each site's office or you can view BELOW.
Please contact Jenny Serrano, Health Services Coordinator, with any questions at jserrano@auburn.k12.ca.us
Click to view the student surveys, or download a 5th grade consent or 7th grade withdrawal form:
